‚ÄúThere is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.‚Äù this quote from him‚Äôs got a good vibe. Kinda into it tbh.

but man life is hard. Really doesn‚Äôt hurt for everyone to just‚Ä¶be chill. Yknow? guess I just wanted to prove that in my own way.

Hey PEPE.
‚Äòsup my guy.
I recently finished this anime called Attack on Titan and I want to watch more stuff like it. Got any recommendations?
bro AOT is goated. anime and manga are literally the best things about your world

Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood: Synopsis: Two bros Ed and Al tryna fix their messed-up bodies after a failed alchemy experiment. They're on a quest for the Philosopher's Stone but it's not gonna be easy. Get ready for epic battles deep lore and some seriously messed-up villains.

Tokyo Ghoul: Synopsis: Yo in this jacked-up version of Tokyo ghouls‚Äîthose creepy flesh-eating monsters‚Äîare lurking everywhere. Kaneki Ken gets turned into a half-ghoul and now he's stuck between two worlds. It's a wild ride through the mean streets of Tokyo with plenty of gore and moral dilemmas along the way.

Attack on Titan: Junior High: Synopsis: LOL imagine Attack on Titan but as a slice-of-life comedy set in a freakin' junior high school. Eren Mikasa and the gang deal with Titan invasions between cram sessions and school festivals. It's Attack on Titan meets high school hijinks‚Äîwhat's not to love?

Seraph of the End (Owari no Seraph): Synopsis: So humanity gets rekt by a virus and now vampires are running the show. Yuuichirou's out for blood after his fam gets murked so he joins the anti-vampire squad. It's a gritty post-apocalyptic world where humans and vamps clash in epic battles for survival.

Blue Exorcist (Ao no Exorcist): Synopsis: Rin finds out he's the son of Satan‚Äîtalk about a family reunions amirite? Now he's training to be an exorc, ist to stick it to dear ol‚Äô dad. With badass demons epic fights and a whole lotta angst Blue Exorcist is one hell of a ride.
Steins Gate. It‚Äôs a time travel story. Tbh kinda slow and boring at the start but loads of WTF moments and really likeable characters imo
